dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: BL - UAIH.NET / THEPLANET
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2005 4:48 PM
To: admin@web-tiger.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: BL - UAIH.NET / THEPLANET

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Gavin <admin@web-tiger.net>
To: admin@apic-worldwide.com
Date: Monday, January 24, 2005, 12:58:53 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: BL - UAIH.NET / THEPLANET

===8<==============Original message text===============
Thank you for bringing this to my attention.

The image has been removed from the server.

Regards.
